attributes.action: End repossessions permanently as unionised Royal Mail not TNT is in accordance with Labour ideology and union demands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Minister, 

  

I am writing to express my concern and lobby as a Labour Party cousin with SWP that you implement a stop to all repossessions immediately, guarantee jobs and homes as in line with Labour party ideology that specifically states in Government Labour must cat in line with its ideology and union funding to replace TNT the Tory government mail service with Royal Mail (for whom I have worked and am a trade unionist) a public service that has unionised labour and democratic accountability that render it the only form of Government Mail service acceptable in regard of the specific implementation of core Labour ideology in Government to the party member you lean to pay call bills, the voter who watched Northern Rock repossess families having been bailed out and the unions who fund a party that has not repealed anti-union legislation (183 demands thereof) and the contradiction of not having unionised labour having the honour of ensuring Royal Mail quality, trade union accountable
